head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE ¶ . ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary. ¶ Sir, ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending ¶ ¶ October 31st....

div.p: H75/8783, unit 814, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
To the Honorable the Chief Secretary.
I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending October 31st. 1875.

cell.style: border-top: 0.0208in solid #000000; border-left: 0.0069in solid #000000; border-bottom: 0.0208in solid #000000; border-right: 0.0208in solid #000000; padding-top: 0in; padding-left: 0.0555in; padding-bottom: 0in; padding-right: 0.0555in;

cell.p:
Estimate* of Expenditure for
2 months
Quarter crossed out.

cell.p:
Total— One hundred and eighty three pounds
thirteen shillings and
four pence

div.p:
Signature of the Officer authorized to certify to accounts
Ferd. von Mueller.
